node.display_long_description:
Must-have bow & arrow action game with state of the art Quest graphics. 

NEW GAME MODE “SIEGE OF HEAVEN” AND QUEST 2 UPGRADES!!!

Battle through the floating castles of medieval fantasy to restore Harmony in Heaven, Purgatory & Hell. Rain down arrows against forsaken souls and angelic creatures that have taken over the afterlife.

Finally a great Roguelite on Quest, excellent great replay value that adapts to the player’s skill level and progress as they play. Three beautiful and mysterious, procedurally generated worlds, with infinite replayability, three epic boss fights, multiple optional areas with great loot.

NEW! Free DLC with gate-defense game mode “Siege of Heaven” with 3 extra maps, 50+ new achievements, and leaderboards - perfect for new players and casual VR enthusiasts and advanced players alike, enjoy VR’s highest-rated bow & arrow mechanics shooting a safe spot in a beautiful environment.

Uses VR to the max and makes the most of Quest & Quest 2.

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
We’re back with more improvements before the holidays!

Version 1.2.6
- Improved the Tournament stone plate readability
- Improved the enemy hit and death sounds
- Improved the volume of multiple sound effects

Version 1.2.5
- You can now play the DLC without having to finish your main mode run! 
- Items in the shop are no longer getting re-randomized after loading a saved game
- We added a new “Total“ leaderboard to Siege of Heaven
- We have new combo sounds that communicate the combo better and are more satisfying
- The game now displays a screenshot when you’re in the Oculus Dashboard 
- Also when the headset is off the game’s automatically put on pause

Happy holidays, we keep working hard to make the game better and we’d love to hear from you at hello@superbright.org and on our community discord at discord.com/invite/9xMrHdp

nodes.title: Siege of Heaven Legends Tournament
nodes.body_text:
Welcome to the first DLC-exclusive tournament:
“Siege of Heaven Legends”

We’re excited to announce the first Siege of Heaven Legends Tournament! Celebrate the holiday season by showing off your archery skills, dominating the leaderboards, and scoring some non-virtual loot as well.

The highest combined score from the three DLC maps wins!
(ends December 29th, 2020 11:59 pm PST)

- The winner gets an Oculus Quest 2 256GB and three Quest games of their choice
- 2nd and 3rd place get an Oculus Quest 2
- Top 10 players will have their names immortalized in the game
- Top 100 will be included in the game’s Hall of Fame
- Top 1000 have a chance to be picked to win one of THREE Oculus Quest 2’s

Tournament score can be seen in the “TOURNAMENT” leaderboard, existing scores already count!

Winners will be announced on facebook.com/superbrightvr and twitter.com/superbrightvr

Come discuss the best strategies, hear about tips and tricks on our community Discord at discord.com/invite/9xMrHdp

nodes.title: FREE DLC "SIEGE OF HEAVEN" with a new game mode is out NOW!
nodes.body_text:
Defend the gates of Heaven!

The update brings a completely new mode - a gate defense mode focused on skillful shooting and comes with 3 new maps, 50+ new achievements, and new leaderboards.

“Siege of Heaven” brings new and different challenges for the fans of the game’s shooting mechanics, and balances the main loop’s long session lengths with the mode’s shorter 15 minute playthrough times, with an opportunity to storm the new leaderboards that reward new skills.

The new mode has also been made to be welcoming to a wider audience - new and casual players can enjoy some of the best archery in VR at their own pace, away from enemies, and without the additional challenges of movement and 360 degree combat. Set in beautiful floating worlds, the mode can be used to get familiar with the bow and arrow mechanics in a safe environment.

Get In Death: Unchained now or update the game to get the FREE DLC if you already own it!

node.reviewDescription:
Updated (again) - 11/6/2020 

Superbright is leading the way VR developers, pay attention. 

And I'm not even speaking to the quality of their game In Death Unchained, although it's excellent, I'm referring to their dedication to the gaming community. Superbright respects their audience enough to listen, engage in dialogue, and update their wonderful product to reflect the feedback, desires, and collective wisdom of us, the humble players.

This is a 21st century developer, using modern communication methods to engage with their base and improve their product. 
Constantly. 
Consistently. 
The version of In Death which I'm about to play today is heads and shoulders above the day-1 version, and that's a fantastic thing. Even more fantastic, is the fact that 90% of these improvements were called out by us, the players. Superbright is forging the path of developing a RELATIONSHIP with us, based on 2-way communication, with everyone involved laser focused on just shaping a really really good game. Ultimately, it's all about fun, right? Buying In Death on day-1, leaving a review and having Superbright leave a thoughtful reply, playing In Death again a few days later and seeing improvements implemented that I contributed towards.....that's all been a really fun, and rewarding, experience.

Going forward, I will be buying any Quest product produced by Superbright sight unseen, because I have confidence that they have my best interests at heart, and they have the humility to exist in a state of constant learning, change, and improvement. This is how you make a customer for life. Well done Superbright.

TL;DR: Agile. Nimble. Responsive. Respectful of our time & passion. They listen, and they improve. Bravo Superbright. Five Stars.
